title: How Do They Move?
description: How Do They Move? is an informational book that explains the ways in which a variety of animals move. Readers are presented with word and picture clues that help them identify the animals illustrated on each page. The repetitive word pattern, simple sentence structure, and use of high-frequency vocabulary make this an enjoyable book for early readers.
reviewWords: animals, fins, flippers, legs, strong, wings
phonics: Consonant Blends : Read words with s-family blends
wordWork: Alphabetizing                : Place words in alphabetical order
